name: Screentonic
overview:
As of May 3, 2007, ScreenTonic SA was acquired by Microsoft Corporation. ScreenTonic SA provides mobile advertising solutions for mobile carriers and portals in Europe. It offers mobile ad server solutions in application service provider mode, as well as mobile media sales activities. The company sells advertising on behalf of the mobile portals, as well as manages and hosts advertising campaigns on mobile applications. It also offers STAMP, a technological platform for managing and delivering ads on mobile phones, as well as allows mobile portals to display advertising content on their mobile pages or in their mobile applications. In addition, the company provides mobile commercial brokerage services. It serves advertisers, mobile Internet agencies, and mobile Internet portals.

The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Paris, France with additional offices in London, the United Kingdom; and Madrid, Spain.
